content:
From: Peter Lammich <lammich@in.tum.de>
Apparently, a

isabelle components -I

is required to set up the whole thing.
The error message when there is no such setup could be better, though.

From: Manuel Eberl <eberlm@in.tum.de>
Note that this is documented in ~~/README_REPOSITORY.

Manuel
smime.p7s

From: Peter Lammich <lammich@in.tum.de>
On Fri, 2021-03-12 at 13:54 +0100, Manuel Eberl wrote:

Note that this is documented in ~~/README_REPOSITORY.

Oh, I overlooked README_REPOSITORY. I checked README, but there is no
reference to README_REPOSITORY in there, though it knows that it is a
repository version!

"
Version information

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
The README is for releases, where README_REPOSITORY is actually absent.

I was hoping that the long and unusual name README_REPOSITORY makes it stick
out naturally --- and I keep pointing out that file frequently.

Makarius

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev
